alert.note: Alert for Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 10:22PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Texas County through 1100 PM CDT... At 1022 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southwest of Guymon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Guymon, Hooker, Goodwell, Optima and Hardesty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
